channel.title: Ok need a bit of help again -.- its portfarwarding
channel.description: Ok umm i got a no-ip set up and i used a guide that said to use utorrent as a portfarwarder but prob is my buddy uses it and it works, people can play on his server.No1 can get on my server when i do the exact same thing he does so can anyone tell me something to uyse other than utorrent as a portfarwarding program?

item.title: Ok need a bit of help again -.- its portfarwarding
item.dc:creator: @soi_spoon soi spoon
item.description:
@soi_spoon wrote:

you can port forward normally using your router.

go to http://www.portforward.com

Brendan

Thanks dude, now i dont have to use Utorrent !!!

Read full topic
item.source: Ok need a bit of help again -.- its portfarwarding
